content.text: 1/2 cup white sugar, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1/2 cup white sugar, or to taste" )

content.text: 0) In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine water, 2 1/2 tablespoons sugar, salt and 2 tablespoons vegetable oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@41:48 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "water"@49:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "2 1/2 tablespoons sugar"@56:79 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "salt"@81:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "2 tablespoons vegetable oil"@90:117 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@28:39 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bring to a boil and remove from heat.
2) Stir in flour until mixture forms a ball.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until mixture forms a ball"@17:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Heat oil for frying in deep-fryer or deep skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "oil for frying"@8:22 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "deep-fryer"@26:36 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-3-1 "deep skillet"@40:52 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "375 degrees F"@56:69 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-3-1 "190 degrees C"@71:84 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Pipe strips of dough into hot oil using a pastry bag.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Pipe"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "strips of dough"@8:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "hot oil"@29:36 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-4-0 "a pastry bag"@43:55 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Fry until golden; drain on paper towels.
7) Roll drained churros in cinnamon and sugar mixture.
